backend/main.mo: Main actor for the FAITH X-Stream backend, defining all content types (VideoContent, TVSeries, Episodes, LiveChannels, Brands, Ads, Analytics) and exposing public API methods for content management, user profiles, subscriptions, and Stripe integration, with migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that mirrors all backend data type definitions and provides a `run` function to handle stable state migrations between canister upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two implemented features—footer tagline update and ProfileSetupModal fix—to their affected files, components, and test IDs with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON document providing one-sentence summaries of every frontend source file, serving as a quick reference for the purpose and key changes in each component or page.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app, setting the page title to 'FAITH X-Stream', linking a favicon, and mounting the app into a root div via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the TanStack Router route tree with all application routes (home, live, movies, TV shows, podcasts, admin, payment, etc.), wrapping everything in ThemeProvider and AuthProvider.
frontend/src/components/admin/AnalyticsD: An admin dashboard component that fetches and displays platform analytics including total views, premium users, ad impressions, revenue, and a trending content list.
frontend/src/components/admin/BrandManag: An admin component for creating, deleting, and managing brands, including uploading a logo and assigning films, series, clips, or live channels to a selected brand.
frontend/src/components/admin/ChannelMan: Admin component for creating, editing, and deleting live TV channels, including logo upload and original channel flagging.
frontend/src/components/admin/ClipsManag: Admin component for listing, editing captions, and deleting video clips, with indicators for auto-generated and original clips.
frontend/src/components/admin/LiveSchedu: Admin component for managing live channel schedules, allowing programs to be added or removed from a selected channel's schedule.
frontend/src/components/admin/ManualAdsM: Admin component for uploading ad media files and managing ad assignments (scope, position, skip settings) via a tabbed interface.
frontend/src/components/admin/MasterAdmi: Master admin component that displays all users in a table and allows promoting or demoting users between guest, user, admin, and master admin roles.
frontend/src/components/admin/MoviesMana: Admin component for managing movie/film content, providing forms to upload new movies (with video, trailer, and thumbnail files) and edit or delete existing ones via dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/PodcastsMa: Admin component for managing podcast content, allowing upload of new podcasts with video and thumbnail files, and editing or deleting existing podcast entries.
frontend/src/components/admin/SeriesMana: Admin component for managing TV series, including creating series with thumbnails/trailers and nested management of seasons and episodes via multiple dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/StripeSetu: Admin component for configuring Stripe payment integration, displaying current configuration status and a form to submit a secret key and allowed countries.
frontend/src/components/admin/VideoManag: General admin component for managing non-clip video content of various content types, supporting upload with metadata fields and edit/delete operations via dialogs.
frontend/src/components/BrandRail.tsx: Horizontally scrollable content rail for a single Brand, displaying its associated films, series, and clips as VideoCard/SeriesCard items with left/right scroll buttons and a link to the brand detail page.
A vertical scroll-snapping feed component that displays short video clips with thumbnail backgrounds, play buttons, and metadata overlays. Uses intersection observer for autoplay detection and navigates to the watch page on click.
frontend/src/components/ContentRow.tsx: A horizontally scrollable row of video or series cards with left/right navigation arrows and an optional 'See All' button. Differentiates between VideoContent and TVSeries items to render the appropriate card component.
A reusable dialog modal that displays contextual messages with type-specific icons (info, coming-soon, under-construction, feature-preview) and optional action/close buttons.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with navigation links grouped into Browse, Discover, and Account sections, conditionally showing sign-in or profile links based on authentication state, plus a copyright notice.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky top navigation header with logo, desktop nav links, search bar, and a user dropdown menu that shows admin link and logout options based on authentication and admin status.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: A full-width hero banner that auto-rotates through featured content items, displaying a background video or thumbnail with title, description, and Play/More Info buttons. Supports mute toggle for preview video.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component that wraps all pages with a Header, Footer, and router Outlet, and conditionally renders a ProfileSetupModal for Internet Identity users who haven't completed profile setup.
frontend/src/components/live/LiveGuideGr: Renders an EPG-style program guide grid with a fixed channel column and a horizontally scrollable time-slot grid, auto-scrolling to the current time on mount.
frontend/src/components/LiveTVSyncPlayer: File is empty with no content.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog component that collects a new user's display name and email, assigns the 'user' role via the actor, and saves the profile to the backend, invalidating the profile query on success.
frontend/src/components/SeriesCard.tsx: A clickable card component that displays a TV series thumbnail, title, season/episode count, and an 'Original' badge, navigating to the series detail page on click.
frontend/src/components/VideoCard.tsx: A clickable card component that renders a video thumbnail with Premium and Original badges, title, and genre, navigating to the watch page on click.
frontend/src/components/VideoPlayer.tsx: A full-featured custom HTML5 video player supporting ads (pre-roll/mid-roll), autoplay with trailer or preview mode, live TV seeking, quality selection, and standard playback controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, and invalidates all dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.tsx: Provides an AuthContext supporting Internet Identity and email login, persisting sessions to localStorage and exposing login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook using DFINITY's AuthClient, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validity.
frontend/src/hooks/useIntersectionAutopl: Custom hook that uses IntersectionObserver to track visibility of a list of elements and fires a callback when items cross a configurable visibility threshold.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data (videos, series, live channels, brands, ads, user profiles, etc.) via the ICP actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionStorageStat: A useState-like hook that persists its value to sessionStorage, initializing from stored data and syncing on every update.
frontend/src/hooks/useVerticalScrollSnap: Attaches a debounced scroll listener to a container ref to calculate the snapped item index after scrolling stops and invoke an optional callback.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind CSS, defines CSS custom properties for a dark red-themed design system using OKLCH colors, and provides utility classes for scrollbars, gradients, and layout helpers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with TanStack Query's QueryClientProvider and a custom InternetIdentityProvider for authentication.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page that checks caller admin status and renders a tabbed interface for managing movies, podcasts, videos, clips, series, channels, live schedules, brands, ads, analytics, Stripe setup, and master admin controls.
frontend/src/pages/BrandDetailPage.tsx: Detail page for a specific brand/network that displays the brand's logo, name, description, and its associated films, series, and clips fetched and filtered from global content queries.
frontend/src/pages/ClipsPage.tsx: Page that displays all short-form video clips in a vertical-aspect grid with hover overlays and navigates to the watch page on click.
frontend/src/pages/EpisodePlayerPage.tsx: Episode player page that resolves a series/season/episode from URL params, handles premium access gating, selects appropriate ads for non-premium users, and renders the VideoPlayer with episode metadata.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page that fetches all videos, series, and brands to render a hero section, categorized content rows (movies, podcasts, originals), brand rails, and a clips feed with skeleton loading states.
frontend/src/pages/LivePage.tsx: Displays a Live TV page with channel selection buttons, a video player that seeks to the current program offset, and an EPG guide grid. Auto-selects the first channel on load and uses EPG utilities to determine the current program.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders a login/register page supporting both Internet Identity and email/password authentication. Redirects authenticated users to the home page and handles form state, errors, and loading indicators.
frontend/src/pages/MoviesPage.tsx: Shows a searchable grid of VOD movies filtered from all videos by content type. Displays skeleton loaders while fetching and an empty state when no results are found.
frontend/src/pages/NetworksPage.tsx: Lists all brands/networks as clickable cards with logos and content counts, navigating to a brand detail page on click. Shows skeleton loaders during fetch and an empty state if no brands exist.
frontend/src/pages/OriginalsPage.tsx: Displays FAITH X-Stream original content organized into tabbed sections for Films, Series, Documentaries, and Educational videos. Filters videos and series by the isOriginal flag and renders grid skeletons while loading.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Simple error page shown after a failed payment, with buttons to navigate home or retry via the admin route.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Verifies a Stripe checkout session by session ID, invalidates the user profile cache on success, and displays a confirmation screen with navigation options. Shows a spinner while the session status is loading.
frontend/src/pages/PodcastsPage.tsx: Displays a filterable grid of podcast videos fetched via `useGetAllVideos`, showing only non-clip VOD entries with `contentType === 'podcast'`. Includes a search bar, skeleton loading state, and an empty state message.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows the authenticated user's profile information, admin status, and watch history using several query hooks. Handles loading, unauthenticated, and missing-profile states with appropriate fallback UI.
frontend/src/pages/SearchResultsPage.tsx: Performs a backend search using the actor based on the `q` URL parameter and displays categorized results (films, series, clips, brands) using `VideoCard` and `SeriesCard` components.
frontend/src/pages/SeriesDetailPage.tsx: Renders a detail page for a TV series, showing a hero image, description, and an accordion list of seasons and episodes with play buttons that navigate to the episode watch route.
frontend/src/pages/TVShowsPage.tsx: Displays a searchable, responsive grid of all TV series fetched via `useGetAllSeries`, with skeleton loading and an empty state for no results.
frontend/src/pages/UpgradePage.tsx: Presents a premium subscription upgrade page with a Stripe checkout flow, listing plan features and pricing. Redirects admin users away automatically and shows a loading state while checking configuration.
frontend/src/pages/VideoPlayerPage.tsx: Page component that renders a video player for a given content ID, handling premium access control, ad assignment logic (video-specific and global), and loading/not-found states.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Empty TypeScript types index file with no current exports.
frontend/src/utils/contentType.ts: Utility functions for mapping backend ContentType enum values to human-readable labels and grouping types by category (movie/film, podcast).
frontend/src/utils/epg.ts: Utility functions for the Electronic Program Guide (EPG), including generating time slots, computing looping program blocks with positioning percentages, and finding the current program for a live channel.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom fonts, brand colors, border radii, box shadows, keyframe animations, and plugins (animate, typography, container-queries).
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing two pending fix requests: updating the footer tagline text and fixing the profile setup modal flow for authenticated users.
